title: Password reset issue
description: Customer unable to reset password due to expired reset token.

title: Login issue with 2FA
description: User unable to complete two-factor authentication after code submission.

title: Error in billing calculation
description: Monthly billing total shows incorrect values for several users.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: User requested dark mode support for the dashboard.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Payment service fails intermittently with a timeout error during checkout.

title: UI alignment issue on mobile
description: Buttons in the mobile view overlap on smaller screens.

title: Slow response from API endpoint
description: API endpoint /v1/data responds slowly under high load.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Customers report not receiving email notifications for password changes.

title: Broken image links on homepage
description: Several image links on the homepage return 404 errors.

title: Database replication lag
description: Replication between primary and secondary databases is delayed by several minutes.

title: Customer data export failure
description: Export tool fails when generating CSV files for large datasets.

title: Search function returning incomplete results
description: Search feature only returns partial matches, missing some valid results.

title: Notification bell not updating count
description: Notification icon count does not update after viewing new alerts.

title: Error 500 on report generation
description: Generating usage reports occasionally triggers a 500 internal server error.

title: User session expiring too early
description: Users are logged out after 5 minutes of inactivity instead of the expected 30 minutes.
